about_the_game:
The Evil Presence is an immersive first-person psychological horror experience with an average completion time of 50 minutes, where you experience supernatural occurrences after 3:00 AM in a house with a macabre past. Your goal is to survive.

FEATURES

  • Immersive Graphics: High-quality graphics provide a highly immersive horror experience.
  • True Horror Experience: You are not a fighter - if you want to survive, walk carefully.
  • Walking Simulator: Walk around the house to explore and progress.
  • Short Experience: Average completion time of 50 minutes.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: The Evil Presence is an immersive first-person psychological horror game. After moving into a new house, a man experiences supernatural occurrences and discovers the untold history of the residence.
